title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk; vegetable fiber
Technique: painted and printed on fancy gauze weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William P. Treadwell
description: Sheer scarf of fancy gauze weave; white with tiny all-over painted flowers; warp of some vegetable fibre-weft of silk. One tuck near hem.
